name: Freekick & Trick Shot
description:
Take aim at the goal with a trick shot.

The operation is simple flick only, but the power adjustment is very deep.
Will you be able to master the curved kicks??


[Features]
- Funny 96 levels
- Somewhat realistic 3D Game
- Many unique balls
- Mini game Foot Darts
- Record & Share your gameplay
- Your arm will get tired


Give it a try right now!!


***** Works with iPhone5s+, iPad Air+ *****
